WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tree to a genius immediately becomes lumber. They can look at the tree and see more: the ability to turn it into lumber into material and use it for a million different things.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the genius staring at a large tree. Math symbols and equations fly around in their head, until finally a little lightbulb and a pile of lumber appear above their head.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This genius doesn't want to use the lumber to build a house or a chair, no no, they're going to use these materials to build a xylophone (ã–ã„)! The most difficult instrument to create!!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Watch as the tree becomes lumber and that lumber is used to craft a ginormous xylophone. Each key is its own plank of lumber!

Radicals: æœ¨, æ‰  (tree, genius)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tree to a genius immediately becomes lumber. They can look at the tree and see more: the ability to turn it into lumber into material and use it for a million different things.
Picture the genius staring at a large tree. Math symbols and equations fly around in their head, until finally a little lightbulb and a pile of lumber appear above their head.
Reading Mnemonic
This genius doesn't want to use the lumber to build a house or a chair, no no, they're going to use these materials to build a xylophone (ã–ã„)! The most difficult instrument to create!!
Watch as the tree becomes lumber and that lumber is used to craft a ginormous xylophone. Each key is its own plank of lumber!
